As such, it is not intended to be modified, distributed, or commercialized by users.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| nan                    | Incident Response                | Could you please explain how you log user prompts and interactions with your AI system, and how this information is shared with us for transparency, especially in cases of breaches or disputes? | While most of the AI/ML capabilities expose themselves through product features, in those cases where the users engage with a co-pilot/chatbot we log all user prompts which can be replayed back as needed. We can share those with you either as log exports or by simply allowing you to view "history" within the bot.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| nan                    | nan                              | What is your process for handling data breaches or security incidents related to your AI/ML systems?                                                                                              | Our documented incident response plan identifies key incident response personnel including multiple contact methods and steps involved in incident response including preparation, detection, containment, eradication, recovery and root cause analysis. Proper evidence gathering, third party involvement, legal involvement and communication guidelines are defined.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Technical              | Model Development and Training   | What types of data are used to train your AI/ML models?                                                                                                                                           | Our models use content metadata provided by the platforms in which we operate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| nan                    | nan                              | How often are your models updated or retrained?                                                                                                                                                   | We follow a continuous improvement process with an active feedback loop including a human-in-the-loop process. Different models have different frequencies at which new iterations are pushed out. They can range from a few days to a few weeks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| nan                    | Algorithm and Model Details      | Can you provide details on the algorithms and methodologies used in your AI/ML models?                                                                                                            | We use different models for different use cases. As an example, for NLP based solutions, we use gcld3, Sentence Transformers, and Opus. We use XGBoost for predictive modelling. From a methodology perspective, we leverage K-fold cross validation, violin plots, and metrics such as Precision@K to name a few.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| nan                    | nan                              | What steps do you take to validate and test your AI/ML models before deployment?                                                                                                                  | We leverage k-fold and stratified k-fold and have a robust sampling and testing process                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| nan                    | Data Security                    | How do you ensure the security of data used in and produced by your AI/ML systems?                                                                                                                | We ensure the security of data used in and produced by our systems through a combination of technical and organizational measures. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and access is strictly limited to authorized personnel based on the principle of least privilege. Our systems are hosted in a secure environment with continuous monitoring, vulnerability management, and regular audits to ensure compliance with industry best practices and relevant regulations.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| nan                    | nan                              | What encryption standards and security protocols do you follow?                                                                                                                                   | Data in motion is encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher; encryption at-rest is encrypted using AES-256.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | Data Segregation                 | How do you ensure data segregation between different customers' data?                                                                                                                             | The ViewIQ platform is a multi-tenant environment. Multi-tenant customer data is logically segmented through unique identifiers and database controls.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| nan                    | nan                              | What mechanisms or technologies are in place to keep our data separate from other clients' data?                                                                                                  | We leverage AWS best practices for data sanctity in the design of the multi-tenancy in ViewIQ                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| nan                    | Integration and Interoperability | How easily can your AI/ML solution integrate with our existing systems and data sources?                                                                                                          | While most of our AI/ML capabilities focus on foundational / back-end systems, those which are exposed to external environments have extensible programmable interfaces we can use to integrate into external systems                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| nan                    | nan                              | Do you support standard APIs for data exchange and system integration?                                                                                                                            | Yes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | Performance and Scalability      | What are the performance metrics of your AI/ML models (e.g., accuracy, precision, recall)?                                                                                                        | We use Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1 scores. These scores vary for the different models and are continually changing (with a focus on improving) as we keep tweaking and tuning the models.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| nan                    | nan                              | How does your solution scale with increasing data volumes and complexity?                                                                                                                         | Our systems are actively load distributed and designed to auto-scale to meet demand                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | Monitoring and Maintenance       | How do you monitor the performance and accuracy of your AI/ML models in real-time?                                                                                                                | We monitor a randomly sampled dataset from our corpus on a continual basis to get a view into the perfromance and accuracy of the model in production                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| nan                    | nan                              | What is your process for maintaining and updating the models once they are in production?                                                                                                         | Using the human-in-the-loop and a programmatic feedback loop ensures that we get constant view into model performance. Our continuous integration process accounts for maintenance and updates.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| nan                    | User Training and Support        | What kind of training and support do you provide to ensure our team can effectively use your AI/ML solution?                                                                                      | The use cases our models are designed for do not require direct integration of the model itself into an external system, but in those cases (eg. co-pilot/chatbot) where a customer engages directly with the solution, we have a product marketing and training and enablement team which provides support.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| nan                    | nan                              | Do you offer documentation, tutorials, or customer support for troubleshooting?                                                                                                                   | yes, we have a dedicated help-center with a team to help solve for this.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Commercial             | Packaging                        | How is your AI/ML offering packaged? Has it been embedded into new or existing products?                                                                                                          | Anwered in Row 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| nan                    | nan                              | Are there different versions of the product? What features and limitations are in each edition?                                                                                                   | Anwered in Row 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| nan                    | nan                              | Are there prerequisite products that we must also purchase?                                                                                                                                       | No, there are none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| nan                    | Pricing                          | What is the price for each product edition? Are AI/ML capabilities offered as part of each edition or only specific ones?                                                                         | All our products are powered by machine learning technology and generative AI and advertisers do not need to pay any additional fee for using this.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | nan                              | How do you charge for your AI/ML product? Does your pricing model include the use of credits, tokens or similar metrics that place limits on usage and may require additional purchases?          | All our products are powered by machine learning technology and generative AI and advertisers do not need to pay any additional fee for using this.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | nan                              | Are there different pricing tiers or packages available based on usage volume or feature sets?                                                                                                    | All our products are powered by machine learning technology and generative AI and advertisers do not need to pay any additional fee for using this.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | nan                              | nan                                                                                                                                                                                               | nan                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| nan                    | Roadmap and future development   | How often is the AI/ML product updated with newer features or models?                                                                                                                             | We follow a continuous iteration process with regard to updating models. These are reflected in the product on a continual basis. New feature developments follow a delivery roadmap. We have a weekly release cadence with packaged features being bought to market at least 2 times a quarter.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| nan                    | nan                              | What is your roadmap for future development and enhancements to your  AI/ML solution?                                                                                                             | We have a robust roadmap which addresses enhancements in Suitability classification, further iterationsin Age/Gender/Language detection, Content Virality identification, Channel Similarity engine, Spend Optimization, and Reinforcement Learning to name a few                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

| <<define>>                                | company_overview_001 | When was your company founded?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Open Field    | 2014                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | nan          |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_002 | Please share your company's core purpose, values, and principles.                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Open Field    | Channel Factory is a global data & technology company that helps media agencies deliver better campaign performance and cost savings across walled-gardens.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | nan          |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Our cutting-edge contextual targeting capabilities and AI-based media optimization focuses on walled gardens such as YouTube, Meta, TikTok, and Connected TV platforms enabling us to serve ads adjacent to the most suitable and relevant content .                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Channel Factory is a 10+ year company that is global with offices across 22+ countries in The Americas, Europe, Middle East, Asia and ANZ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | We are a purpose-driven company. We believe in doing good business while doing good. Our purpose is to deliver Conscious Business Performance: we show that by avoiding negative content and aligning with positive content brands increase their campaign efficiency and effectiveness, while supporting media wellness, social responsibility and sustainability to drive better business outcomes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |              |

| <<define>>                                | company_overview_032 | Who are your top customers in these industries?                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Open Field    | Automotive: Mercedes, Nissan, Stellantis, Volkswagen, Kia/Hyundai                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | nan          |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Consumer Packaged Goods: Procter & Gamble, Coty, Storck, Pepsico, Henkel                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Media & Entertainment: Disney, Warner, Apple, Spotify, Amazon, LEGO Group                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Healthcare:  Novartis, GSK, AstraZenica, Novo Nodisk                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Finance:  Bank of America, Capital One Bank, Mastercard, American Express, ABN Amro                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Technology:  Apple, Samsung, Meta, HP, IBM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |              |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_033 | How is your Sales & Support team organized? i.e. Geography, Product Line, Industry, Customer Size, Other                                                                                                                                                                  | Open Field    | Channel Factory’s sales and support are organized by geography and product line. Teams are allocated to regions (e.g., North America, EMEA, InSEA, ANZ) and specialize in product offerings across YouTube, Meta, and TikTok, ensuring clients receive tailored support based on their regional and product-specific needs​.                       In addition Channel Factory operates with a dedicated global Brand Partnerships (BP) team that manages and services global clients. This team acts as the central point of contact for global discussions and hubbed campaign setups. This ensures machine learning communication and cohesive strategies that align with your global objectives. Additionally, our global media agency teams collaborate closely with the BP team to ensure alignment and success across all campaigns                                                                       | nan          |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_034 | What is your approach or philosophy regarding Brand Safety and Suitability?                                                                                                                                                                                               | Open Field    | Channel Factory’s philosophy on Brand Safety and Suitability centers on proactive, inclusive, and context-driven advertising custom tailored to each of clients. We believe brand suitability is a tailored version of brand safety that differs per brand. ie Heineken wants to exclude driving and car content as they are an alcohol brand, where car manufacturers like BMW are targeting this kind of content actively. We use advanced proprietary tools like ViewIQ to ensure ads are placed in brand-safe environments, emphasizing positive content alignment and supporting diverse creators. Our inclusion-based approach moves beyond simple exclusion methods, allowing brands to engage meaningfully with growth audiences. With real-time AI-driven adjustments, our platform dynamically adapts to evolving content trends, ensuring continuous safety and relevance for our clients' campaigns. | nan          |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_035 | What makes your capabilities and solutions unique compared to others in the industry?                                                                                                                                                                                     | Open Field    | Channel Factory’s unique advantage lies in its use of AI-driven lists, comprehensive inventory scanning, and real-time optimizations. Our approach provides complete control over ad placements, ensuring 99.99% brand safety coverage across multiple languages and local markets​. Channel Factory’s pre-bid suitability evaluates content before impressions are purchased, ensuring ads are placed in suitable environments. This proactive approach protects your brand, saves money through more efficient spending by targeting relevant inventory, and aligns campaigns with your brand values, ensuring relevance and safety from the start. In addition, Channel Factory has local agencies in most countries, delivering a local vision, a local view on content and local service by teams that speak the language.                                                                                  | nan          |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_036 | Do you have an Equity and Inclusion strategy? If so, could you describe it, including any support for diverse suppliers and representation of minorities in the workforce?                                                                                                | Open Field    | Yes, Channel Factory’s “Conscious Advertising” initiative supports diverse creators, amplifying content from underrepresented groups and promoting DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) values. This strategy reflects in our campaigns, where we curate inclusive ad environments and encourage advertisers to reach growth audiences authentically​​. Have a look at our Conscious Business Performance (CBP) approach on our website.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | nan          |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | In addition to supporting equity and inclusion, Channel Factory is diverse owned supplier certified by the NMSDC (National Media Supplier Diversity Council).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |              |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_037 | Have you worked with Procter & Gamble in the past? If so, please provide details on the timing, region, and scope of work.                                                                                                                                                | Open Field    | Channel Factory is Procter & Gamble's current partner of choice for YouTube pre-bid exclusion and inclusion list brand suitability setup. We currently collaborate with 95% of European countries, focusing on excluding child-directed content to enhance campaign performance and ensure ethical targeting by avoiding children as an audience. Additionally, we provide (hyper) contextual targeting to further optimize performance and campaign results.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | nan          |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | Our partnership with Procter & Gamble began in 2022 with initial tests of inclusion lists for pre-bid use, developed based on Procter & Gamble’s suitability and marketing guidelines. The success of these tests led to expanded inclusion list campaigns in 2023, achieving 100% guaranteed suitability and measurable performance improvements. Initially, we managed 20,000 channel lists, but through collaboration with Google/YouTube, we expanded this to 100,000 lists, delivering significant CPM and result enhancements.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                           |                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |               | We also partnered on a comprehensive research project led by Procter & Gamble's measurement team in Geneva, exploring the impact of inclusion vs. exclusion lists. This research laid the foundation for the current setup active across nearly all European countries, where we primarily implement exclusion lists. Beyond Europe, we engaged with teams in the US and Singapore to discuss content strategy analysis, culminating in a presentation to the full media and marketing team in Singapore. This strategic insight aims to improve campaign performance and results in these regions as well.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
| <<define>>                                | company_overview_038 | Could you provide a general overview of your company's financial health and growth outlook, focusing on stability and risk management?                                                                                                                                    | Open Field    | Channel Factory is financially robust with a diversified revenue base across YouTube, TikTok, and Meta platforms, supported by major brand partnerships in various industries. Positioned for growth, the company leverages rising demand for safe, inclusive, and contextually relevant advertising. Its expansion into 70+ countries and 40+ languages further enhances scalability. Risk management is integral to Channel Factory’s strategy, employing inclusion-based targeting for higher control and minimizing reputational risks. AI-driven optimizations and GDPR compliance bolster security and operational efficiency, ensuring stability and resilience in the digital advertising landscape​​​. Channel Factory is a privately owned company and therefore limited in sharing financial data, but upon request we can share certain insights on the solidity of the company.                     | nan          |

|                                                           |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |               | In addition to the primary categories above, we cover Tier 2,3 and 4 within the IAB content classification as well. Further tailoring includes over +300k keywords in over 49 languages for multi-modal analysis that works on meta data, descriptions, titles, audio transcripts together with analyzing content quality, sentiment and computer vision. Another lever that is available is historical performance on a channel level including, not limited to, minimum video count, last upload date, impressions, view rates, vtrs, ctrs and costs delivered. This allows us to create custom channel and video lists fully tailored for both scalability and cost-efficiency. The process of creating the brand suitability lists is then refreshed dynamically and run through the methodology multiple times a day to ensure trending suitable content is included and anything non-performing is excluded. |              |
| <<define>>                                                | settings_scenarios_014 | Post impression measurement  brand safety and suitability enabled. i.e. platform 1st and/or 3rd party solutions turned on                                                                                                               | Open Field    | Channel Factory is a pre bid solution that promotes full transparency by allowing you to choose an independent measurement partner, ensuring that optimizations are aligned with your business goals, not predefined metrics. Channel Factory’s pre-bid suitability evaluates content before impressions are purchased, ensuring ads are placed in suitable environments. This proactive approach protects your brand, saves money through more efficient spending by targeting relevant inventory, and aligns campaigns with your brand values, ensuring relevance and safety from the start.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | nan          |
| <<define>>                                                | settings_scenarios_015 | Post impression measurement  brand safety and suitability settings. i.e. exact settings, cateotries and risk levels selected                                                                                                            | Open Field    | Post-impression settings are applied to ensure that ads are consistently served in content that aligns with the brand’s selected categories and risk levels. Through automated reporting and real-time updates, Channel Factory continuously evaluates the campaign’s compliance with predefined safety standards.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | nan          |
|                                                           |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |               | Adjustments can be made mid-campaign based on this data, refining placements and enhancing alignment with the brand’s specific requirements for suitable content across different categories and risk thresholds.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
| <<define>>                                                | settings_scenarios_016 | Inclusion of high risk inventory sources  (i.e. Google Video Partners, Meta Audience Network, etc.)                                                                                                                                     | Open Field    | Channel Factory enables brands to exclude high-risk inventory sources like Google Video Partners or Meta Audience Network when necessary. This option reduces exposure to potentially unsafe environments and ensures a greater level of control over ad placements.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | nan          |
|                                                           |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |               | The platform’s inclusion-based targeting approach provides an extra layer of safety by curating content and channels that meet strict brand suitability criteria, thus focusing ad placements within vetted environments and avoiding undesired inventory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |              |
| <<define>>                                                | settings_scenarios_017 | Other                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Open Field    | Channel Factory's governance tools also support diverse language capabilities and regional customization, allowing brands to extend safety and suitability settings across multiple languages and countries. This ensures global campaigns are brand-safe and contextually relevant across all supported markets.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | nan          |
|                                                           |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |               | Additionally, Channel Factory’s automated alerts and API-based integration with DSPs and social platforms allow for real-time corrections if any governance issues arise mid-campaign, offering comprehensive support for maintaining brand integrity throughout the campaign lifecycle.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |              |
