| <<define>>                                      | content_classification_001 | Please provide a high level overview of how your technology works.                                                                                                                                                                                                            | nan           | Channel Factory's technology is a sophisticated platform designed to enhance advertising performance through a blend of AI-driven optimizations, contextual targeting, and real-time adjustments across major social media platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Meta (Facebook and Instagram), and YouTube Shorts. Here are some of the primary components and functionalities of their technology:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | nan          |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 1.Contextual and Audience Targeting: Channel Factory uses an inclusion-based targeting approach, providing control over content safety and audience relevance, even in multiple languages, allowing for comprehensive coverage and precision, especially for brand-suitable content in various languages. In addition we work with exclusion-based setups (like with Procter & Gamble in Europe), for example to exclude context made for kids.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 2. Cross-Platform Optimization: Their technology enables advertisers to activate campaigns across YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, and Instagram. By leveraging Channel Factory’s proprietary platforms.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 3. AI-Powered Campaign Management: Channel Factory’s AI-based systems optimize campaign delivery and performance. Our AI continuously tests and adapts various campaign parameters, like creative choices and audience segments, leading to significant enhancements in metrics like view-through rates (VTR), click-through rates (CTR), and conversions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 4. Data-Driven and Real-Time Reporting: Real-time analytics are integral to Channel Factory’s operations. Our system allows for continuous monitoring and adjustments based on performance data, ensuring efficient media spending and improved results                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 5. Conscious Business Performance: Channel Factory’s Conscious Business Performance initiative emphasizes inclusion and sustainability. This approach advocates for reaching diverse audiences through content that aligns with social values, providing a conscious alternative to the more restrictive exclusion-based ad strategies                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 6. Lead Generation and Quality Assurance: For lead-focused campaigns, Channel Factory ensures that leads are validated and filtered through their AI systems, which are GDPR-compliant. Our technology captures and qualifies leads in real-time, sending verified leads directly to clients' CRM systems to maximize conversion potential                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Channel Factory’s platform combines advanced targeting, comprehensive safety controls, AI optimization, and a focus on inclusive advertising, resulting in a dynamic technology suite that drives effective, scalable campaigns across top digital platforms.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |              |
| <<define>>                                      | content_classification_002 | What Machine Learning & AI techniques are you using to determine brand safety & suitability at scale?                                                                                                                                                                         | nan           | Channel Factory employs a combination of advanced AI and machine learning (Machine Learning) techniques to ensure brand safety and suitability at scale across various platforms. Here’s an overview of our methods:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | nan          |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Contextual Targeting with AI-Powered Platforms:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Channel Factory’s proprietary ViewIQ platform leverages semantic analysis, video transcriptions, and metadata to classify content into appropriate categories. This enables precise targeting by matching ads with content that aligns with brand suitability and safety standards. By using AI-driven real-time analytics, ViewIQ continuously refines inclusion and exclusion lists based on campaign data and performance metrics​​​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Multimodal Technology: To identify unsuitable content our methodology is regularly refreshed and updated by our multimodal machine learning algorithm, with an additional human-vetting layer of suitability to handle evolving content dynamics. This process includes blocking specific phrases and contexts that may indicate unsuitability, particularly for sensitive topics like kid’s content​​, politics etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Inclusion-Based Dynamic Lists: UChannel Factory’s inclusion-based lists are dynamically updated every four hours. This approach ensures real-time adaptability, allowing campaigns to leverage new content while maintaining control over brand-safe placements. This method also enables precise language-based filtering, which is essential for global campaigns​​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Predictive Audience Targeting and Behavioral Data: Channel Factory integrates predictive audience targeting by analyzing behavioral data from a large opt-in panel. This Machine Learning-driven process aligns ads with likely audience interests and preferences, optimizing ad placements for both engagement and suitability​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Real-Time Content and Performance Adjustments: Through real-time performance data, Channel Factory can instantly remove content deemed unsuitable, including emerging or viral content that may pose a brand safety risk. This capability ensures that ads only appear alongside approved content, and unsuitable videos within otherwise safe channels can be excluded as needed​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Human Verification for Complex Suitability: To enhance our Machine Learning-driven results, Channel Factory also incorporates a team of human vetters, ensuring that nuanced content aligns with brand values. This step is particularly useful for managing sensitive topics and culturally specific content​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | These AI and Machine Learning techniques enable Channel Factory to deliver precise, contextually relevant, and brand-safe advertising, ensuring high-performance outcomes across diverse digital platforms.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |              |
| <<define>>                                      | content_classification_003 | How are the Machine Learning & AI models trained? How do you source your training data and what is it composed of?                                                                                                                                                            | nan           | Channel Factory trains its Machine Learning and AI models for brand safety and suitability by leveraging both vast historical campaign data and diverse content inputs. Here’s an outline of their data sourcing and model training approach:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | nan          |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Extensive Training Data from Platform Integrations:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Channel Factory’s ViewIQ platform integrates with Youtube, via our exclusive YTMP partnership - pulling meta data from millions of videos / channels on Youtube and categorizing them using our multimodal technology. This integration provides a wealth of contextual data, including video metadata, audience interactions, and engagement metrics, allowing for precise categorization and suitability scoring​. The AI models are also trained on historical performance data, informed by the results of hundreds of millions of dollars in past campaigns. This data helps refine the model’s understanding of successful ad placements, optimizing safety and suitability parameters in real-time. Channel Factory’s historical dataset includes KPIs like CPM, CPV, and VTR.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Our models can analyze audio transcripts to map language and context at a more nuanced level than typical metadata. By categorizing spoken content, they go beyond tags to determine whether specific phrases or topics align with a brand’s suitability requirements. This includes identifying nuances that could otherwise be overlooked by basic metadata analysis.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Channel Factory uses behavioral and demographic data from a global opt-in panel for predictive targeting, which informs models about audience preferences and potential safety risks. This data, combined with Comscore’s predictive audience targeting, allows the models to tailor ad placements to audience groups that align with brand values and safety standards.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Channel Factory incorporates real-time campaign performance data as feedback to refine and adjust the models dynamically. For instance, if a placement underperforms in safety or engagement, this feedback is immediately used to retrain and adjust future targeting, ensuring continuous optimization and suitability alignment across platforms.By leveraging these varied data sources and continuously adapting their models, Channel Factory ensures high accuracy and relevance in brand-safe advertising across a vast digital landscape.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |              |

Please explain systems and auditing procedures                                                                                                                                                  | Open Field    | Dynamic Inclusion Lists: Channel Factory updates inclusion lists every four hours to account for newly flagged content, emerging trends, and viral videos. This continuous updating process ensures that brands avoid sudden unsuitability issues associated with new content, thus reducing false negatives (allowing unsuitable content) and false positives (unnecessarily blocking suitable content)lusion Lists and Language Filtering**: Using extensive exclusion lists covering 150,000 keywords across 49 languages, the system effectively reduces inaccuracies by screening specific terms and language nuances that could be misinterpreted in brand safety contexts . Human Oversight for Sensitive Categories: For content that may involve complex cultural or contextual nuances, human reviewers conduct an additional layer of vetting. This helps catch subtle issues that AI models might miss, especially in high-risk categories where automated systems alone could produce false negatives . | nan          |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Cross-Reference: Channel Factory provides clients with the option to use their own third-party verification services, like Integral Ad Science (IAS) and DoubleVerify (DV), to independently assess campaign placements and provide additional validation. This impartiality allows the system to refine its accuracy, reducing biases and potential blind spots . Behavioral Insights Integration: Leveraging predict data, the system can adjust its safety protocols based on user engagement trends, further minimizing false positives by better aligning with actual viewer behavior .                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |              |

| <<define>>                                      | content_classification_054 | What is your process for creating custom brand suitability definitions and thresholds?                                                                                                                                                                                        | Open Field    | Channel Factory’s process for creating custom brand suitability definitions and thresholds involves a collaborative and data-driven approach that aligns with each brand's unique values and objectives. |                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 1. Initial Brand Suitability Deep Dive:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Client Consultation: Channel Factory begins with a detailed consultation with the brand to understand its specific requirements, including any content sensitivities, audience expectations, and brand positioning in the market. This includes defining “grey content” boundaries, such as content that may not be inherently unsafe but could be unsuitable based on the brand's image​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Content and Value Mapping: Brands outline the types of content they want to avoid or prioritize based on their values. For example, a brand may avoid content with strong language or prefer content that aligns with diversity and sustainability. This step also includes using Channel Factory’s suitability survey, which helps refine content preferences and ensures alignment with the brand’s mission​​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 2. Setting Custom Thresholds and Content Types                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Dynamic Inclusion/Exclusion Lists: Based on the initial consultation, Channel Factory develops bespoke inclusion and exclusion lists that align with brand-specific suitability standards. These lists are continuously updated and allow for granular control over content categories, keywords, and languages​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Defining KPI-Driven Suitability Metrics: Brands work with Channel Factory to establish KPIs for brand-safe content, such as view-through rates (VTR), engagement, and cost per view (CPV). This data-driven approach ensures that brand suitability aligns not only with qualitative preferences but also with quantitative goals, allowing brands to prioritize content that drives high engagement while remaining safe​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | 3. Implementing Contextual and Behavioral Targeting                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Contextual Targeting and Machine Learning: Channel Factory’s ViewIQ platform uses AI-driven contextual targeting to segment and analyze content based on both behavioral data and content metadata. This process considers multiple layers, including topics, sentiment, language, and tone, to ensure that ads align with the desired content environment​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |              |
|                                                 |                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |               | Behavioral Insights: Channel Factory leverages Comscore’s third-party audience insights to predict audience suitability, allowing for targeted, contextually appropriate ad placements​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |              |

This adaptive approach ensures that campaigns remain aligned with brand standards over time​.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |              |
